name: Komputer Keeper
description:
Presentation

The player takes on the role of an anti-virus agent in charge of defending an old computer. He must prevent viruses from infecting the machine at all costs by using his weapon and cleverly placed towers.

A game made during a jam organized by our school during two days.

Controls

WASD to move
Right click hold + left click to shoot

Credits

Hugo Barbary - dev
Charles Priercourt - dev
Nicolas Decouture - fx artist
Safran Reynaert - 3d artist
Felix Coeugniet - 3d artist
Axelle Dierickx - 2d artist
Gabin Bastard - game designer

Thank you to our teachers for organizing this jam.
